hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\blueE7$ tens and $\blueE5$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/c6c4ad12f24269c0593c48469da673232eb1b813)

There are $\blueE{75}$ blocks.

The second set of blocks shows $\maroonD3$ tens and $\maroonD{4}$ ones. 

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/542506804a06cc1c840bbb9ebae1c46e59fd7358)

So, we are subtracting $\maroonD{34}$ blocks.

When we subtract $\blueE{75}-\maroonD{34}$, the difference is $\blueE{41}$ blocks.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/b768772d8dd08c8042709ac7c356c948f16c5c25)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$75-34 = 41$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/270159781238cd4c01a04db89a3916d09ee02306)

[[☃ radio 1]]
